title: You Didn’t Have to Go
raw_lyrics:
You didn’t have to go you knew that I’d be blue
And now you’re far away I don’t know what I’ll do
It won’t be very long there’ll come a day I know
You’ll see that you were wrong you didn’t have to go

What made you change your mind why did you say goodbye
You left our love behind you left me here to cry
I guess you didn’t know where this would lead me to
There’ll never be a day of sunshine without you

lines: You didn’t have to go you knew that I’d be blue
And now you’re far away I don’t know what I’ll do
It won’t be very long there’ll come a day I know
You’ll see that you were wrong you didn’t have to go
What made you change your mind why did you say goodbye
You left our love behind you left me here to cry
I guess you didn’t know where this would lead me to
There’ll never be a day of sunshine without you
